Like usual, our heroes help the poor to defend themselves and provoke some funny fist fights in the process. (from Wikipedia)","poster_path":"/v0Tp0mseXNrxWjGKLyI2Pm5hb1u.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"it","genre_ids":[28,12,35],"popularity":15.063,"release_date":"1974-12-21","video":false,"vote_average":6.508,"vote_count":251},{"backdrop_path":"/4kywRRzIJqRwH48IvJ6npRvqgM5.jpg","id":6399,"title":"Who Finds a Friend Finds a Treasure","original_title":"Chi trova un amico trova un tesoro","overview":"Alan gets a map to some war treasure which the Japanese army left behind on a small Pacific island at the end of World War II. But some gangsters try to steal the map from him and so he hides on Charlie's boat which just leaves the harbor. He manipulates the ship's compass so that Charlie is not aware that he is sailing to the treasure island. Nicola, thanks to Don Gaetano's protection, becomes first an honoured picciotto of the Camorra and then a lawyer.
